person.persName: Robert G. Stoner (Bath County, Kentucky, farm hand and soldier)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of George W. Stoner and Nancy Stoner. Student in Bath County in 1850. Household owned fourteen enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmhand in Bath County in 1860. Household owned nineteen enslaved persons in Bath County in 1860. Captain in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Rifles Battalion (C.S.A.) from October 12, 1861 to July 1, 1862. Lieutenant colonel in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) from December 17, 1862, to 1865.
